definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: I am currently pursuing a PhD degree in Bioinformatics at the UofM.
sentences.chinese: 本人現在正在攻讀生物信息學博士的學位。

sentences.english: Promoter sequence of the gene's upstream was forecasted by bioinformatic method.
sentences.chinese: 結合生物信息學方法分析預測基因上游的啓動子序列。

sentences.english: How will bioinformatics influence metabolic engineering?
sentences.chinese: 生物信息學將如何影響代謝工程？

sentences.english: RNA sequence-structure alignment is a basic problem in bioinformatics.
sentences.chinese: RNA序列結構比對是生物信息學中的基本問題。

sentences.english: This is the website of the University of Washington Structural Informatics GROUP (SIG).
sentences.chinese: 這是華盛頓大學結構信息學網站。

sentences.english: This is the website of Center of BioInformatics Tianjin University.
sentences.chinese: 這是天津大學生物信息學中心的網站。

sentences.english: Bioinformatics is one of most active fields in life science.
sentences.chinese: 生物信息學是生命科學中最活躍的領域之一。

sentences.english: In this paper, the conception of Geo Spatial Information Science (Geomatics) and Digital Earth are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了地球空間信息學和數字地球的基本概念。
